statements: SELECT * FROM Locations
SELECT location_name, inventory_count FROM Locations ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM Locations WHERE warehouse_capacity > 100
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE inventory_count < 50 ORDER BY warehouse_capacity
SELECT location_id, location_name, warehouse_capacity FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 3
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE inventory_count > 0 ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, warehouse_capacity FROM Locations WHERE warehouse_capacity > 100 ORDER BY warehouse_capacity DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, warehouse_capacity, inventory_count FROM Locations WHERE warehouse_capacity < 500 AND inventory_count > 0 ORDER BY location_name;
SELECT location_name, inventory_count FROM Locations WHERE warehouse_capacity IS NOT NULL ORDER BY location_id;
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE warehouse_capacity <> 0 OR inventory_count <> 0 ORDER BY location_name DESC, location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT location_name, inventory_count FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, location_name, inventory_count FROM Locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name, inventory_count FROM Locations WHERE inventory_count > 0;
SELECT location_id, location_name, inventory_count FROM Locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%LA%';
SELECT location_name, inventory_count FROM Locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT from_location_id, to_location_id, quantity, movement_date FROM InventoryMovements WHERE movement_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location_name, inventory_count FROM Locations WHERE inventory_count > 0 ORDER BY inventory_count ASC, location_name DESC;
SELECT from_location_id, to_location_id, product_id, quantity FROM InventoryMovements WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY to_location_id ASC;
SELECT location_name, inventory_count FROM Locations WHERE location_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM Locations;
SELECT inventory_id, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory;
SELECT * FROM InventoryMovements WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT movement_id, inventory_id, from_location_id, to_location_id, movement_date FROM InventoryMovements ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Locations WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM Locations JOIN Inventory ON Locations.location_id = Inventory.location_id WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Locations JOIN Inventory ON Locations.location_id = Inventory.location_id GROUP BY location_name HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT movement_date, product_name, quantity FROM InventoryMovements JOIN Inventory ON InventoryMovements.inventory_id = Inventory.inventory_id ORDER BY movement_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name, location_address FROM Locations WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 5);
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM Locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Warehouse WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM InventoryMovements WHERE movement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM Locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT inventory_id, product_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location_name FROM Warehouse JOIN Locations ON Warehouse.location_id = Locations.location_id;

SELECT movement_id, product_name, from_location_id, to_location_id, movement_date FROM InventoryMovements JOIN Inventory ON InventoryMovements.inventory_id = Inventory.inventory_id ORDER BY movement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Locations
SELECT location_name, location_type FROM Locations ORDER BY location_type DESC
SELECT location_name, location_type FROM Locations WHERE location_type='Warehouse'
SELECT location_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inventory FROM Inventory GROUP BY location_name
SELECT transaction_date, product_name, quantity FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type='Incoming'
SELECT * FROM Locations ORDER BY location_name ASC, location_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT warehouse_name, location_id FROM Warehouse JOIN Locations ON Warehouse.location_id = Locations.location_id WHERE warehouse_name LIKE 'Warehouse%' ORDER BY location_id DESC, warehouse_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Movement GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type, location_name FROM Transactions JOIN Locations ON Transactions.location_id = Locations.location_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, location_name ASC;
